sentences.en: Another time someone saw him using a cheque as a bookmark.
sentences.cn: 还有一次,有人看见他用一张1,500美元的支票作书签.

sentences.en: Click the Toggle a bookmark button on the Text Editor toolbar.
sentences.cn: 在“文本编辑器”工具栏上单击“切换书签”按钮.

sentences.en: He thumbed through the book again to look for the bookmark.
sentences.cn: 他又翻了一遍书,想找到那张书签.

sentences.en: He was observed using a check for $ 1,500 as a bookmark.
sentences.cn: 有人见他把一张一千五佰美元的支票当作书签.

sentences.en: It ruins a book to double back the pages as a bookmark.
sentences.cn: 把书页折起来当作书签用会把书弄坏的.

sentences.en: Material: fresh water pearl , pewter knot, white metal bookmark.
sentences.cn: 素材: 淡水珠,锡盘结, 白铁书签.

sentences.en: Material: Gold Plated Alder Cone, Green Chorite Crystal, gold plated bookmark.
sentences.cn: 素材: 镀金桤木球果吊饰, 绿幽灵水晶, 镀金书签.

sentences.en: Optionally include a bookmark in the output PDF for the chart.
sentences.cn: 选择包括书签,在输出为PDF格式的图表.

sentences.en: Please click on the link below and update your bookmark.
sentences.cn: 请点击以下的网址,并再次输入[书签]/[您的最爱].

sentences.en: Save your favorite devices in the bookmark list, to speed - up theconnection procedure.
sentences.cn: 您能在书签列表中保存您最喜爱的电子设备, 以加快连线过程.

sentences.en: Show bookmark tree and open bookmark in new tab.
sentences.cn: 显示书签树,可以直接开启书签于新分页.

sentences.en: Then , having used the check as a bookmark, he lost the book!
sentences.cn: 后来, 他竟把那本书弄丢了.

sentences.en: This makes it extremely simple to save what you find with an electronic bookmark so you can return to it later.
sentences.cn: 如此一来，用电子书签保存所找到的网页内容就变得非常简单，日后也可以再次访问。

sentences.en: This paper discussed how to devise the printing bookmark classified system.
sentences.cn: 本文探讨了书标分类打印系统的设计与实现方法.

sentences.en: Using this technology, we provide an implementation through the Bookmark Service.
sentences.cn: 并通过Bookmark服务给出了该技术的一种实现方法和实际应用.

trans.tran_en: a piece of paper, leather etc that you put in a book to show you the last page you have read
